enWisdom: The worst of your brothers is the one who makes you accept falsehood

Wisdom: شَرُّ إِخْوَانِكَ مَنْ أَحْوَجَكَ إِلَى مُدَارَاةٍ وَأَلْجَأَكَ إِلَى اعْتِذَارٍ
enWisdom: The worst of your brothers is the one who forces you to compromise and compels you to ask for pardon
The worst of brothers is one who forsakes you [in times of need]

Wisdom: شَرُّ إِخْوَانِكَ مَنْ بْتَغِي لَكَ شَرَّ يَوْمِهِ

enWisdom: The worst of your friends is the one for whom you [always] have to undergo hardship

Wisdom: شَرُّ الْإِخْوَانِ الْمُوَاصِلُ عِنْدَ الرَّخَاءِ وَالْمُفَاصِلُ عِنْدَ الْبَلَاءِ
enWisdom: The worst brother is the one who keeps ties with you in good times but abandons you in times of difficulty

Wisdom: شَرُّ إِخْوَانِكَ مَنْ أَغْرَاكَ بِهَوًى وَوَلَّهَكَ بِالدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: The worst of your brothers is the one who beguiles you with vain desire and distracts you with this world
The worst of your brothers is the deceiving flatterer

Wisdom: شَرُّ إِخْوَانِكَ مَنْ تَثَبَّطَ عَنِ الْخَيْرِ وَثَبَّطَكَ مَعَهُ
enWisdom: The worst of your brothers is the one who is slow in performing good deeds and slows you down [from doing good] along with him

Wisdom: شَرُّ إِخْوَانِكَ وَأَغَشُّهُمْ لَكَ مَنْ أَغْرَاكَ بِالْعَاجِلَةِ وَأَلْهَاكَ عَنِ الْآجِلَةِ
enWisdom: The worst and most deceitful of your brothers is the one who entices you with [the pleasures of] this transitory world and makes you unmindful of the Hereafter
The worst affinity is [one that leads to] putting someone into trouble
